contentrichtext.text: {{For|the former president of Bangladesh|Ziaur Rahman}} '''Ziaur Rahman''' ({{lang-bn|জিয়াউর রহমান}}) (born 1974) is a [[chess]] player from [[Bangladesh]] and the second [[Grandmaster (chess)|Grandmaster]] of the country after [[Niaz Morshed]]. He passed his SSC from Government Laboratory High School & graduated from University of Dhaka. Zia holds the highest [[FIDE]] rating ever achieved by a Bangladeshi chess player (2570 at October 2005 [[Elo rating|FIDE rating]] list). On the May 2009 FIDE list his Elo rating is 2553. Rahman earned the [[International Master]] (IM) title in 1993 and the GM title in 2002.
